name: OfflineSync
summary: OfflineSync manages data synchronization between local storage and a remote database
description:
OfflineSync is a component designed to manage the synchronization of data between a local storage system and a remote database.
It handles background synchronization tasks, including syncing data and managing offline storage.
By using configurable parameters, it supports automatic syncing at specified intervals, while also providing mechanisms for checking network availability and managing offline data storage.
This ensures that the app can seamlessly work with both online and offline data, providing an uninterrupted user experience.
